pages.title: Somnium Damage
pages.text: The Somnium Damage Essence empowers your spells, artifacts, and rings! You can use them a maximum of 5 times. But be careful! the stronger you get the more hallucinations you will have. The darkness will slowly eat you up from them.. take care wanderer!

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: This essence can be crafted in a Somnium Infuser and requires loran energy and somnium.
